page.title: 05COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: NEWS TAKEN FROM ALL THE LOCAL NEWSPAPERS IN ONE WEEK FROM 29TH MAY TO 6TH JUNE 1985. THE BARNET AREA HAS A LARGE NUMBER OF FREE NEWSPAPERS BECAUSE IT IS A RELATIVELY WEALTHY SUBURB. {NEWSPAPERS READ PRICE CIRCULATION {BARNET BOROUGH TIMES FREE 65,150 {BARNET INDEPENDENT FREE 61,000 {LOCAL ADVERTISER FREE 52,000 {CIVIC NEWS FREE 50,000 {BARNET PRESS 18p {FINCHLEY PRESS 18p { {LOCAL NEWS {TYPICAL HOUSE PRICES IN BARNET AREA {1 BEDROOM FLAT WITH GARAGE Â£29,500 {3 BEDROOM SEMI WITH GARAGE Â£64,000 {4 BEDROOM DETACHED WITH GARAGE Â£80,000 {6 BEDROOM DETACHED(VICTORIAN) Â£129,ooo {6 BEDROOM DETACHED,SMALL PLOT Â£250,000 {
